data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Alleged violations of the Charter can also be raised by states in the Security Council. The Security Council ____ subsequently ____ resolutions ____ Chapter VI of ____ UN Charter to ____ the `` Pacific Resolution of ____. '' Such ____ are ____ binding ____ international ____, ____ they ____ are ____ of ____ Council's ____. In rare cases, the Security Council can adopt resolutions under Chapter VII of the UN Charter, related to "threats to Peace, Breaches of the Peace and Acts of Aggression," which are legally binding under international law, and can be followed up with economic sanctions, military action, and similar uses of force through the auspices of the United Nations.
data.partBlankContent: Alleged violations of the Charter can also be raised by states in the Security Council. The Security Council co___ subsequently pa__ resolutions un___ Chapter VI of t__ UN Charter to reco_____ the `` Pacific Resolution of Disp____. '' Such resol______ are n__ binding un___ international l__, tho___ they usu____ are expre_____ of t__ Council's convi______. In rare cases, the Security Council can adopt resolutions under Chapter VII of the UN Charter, related to "threats to Peace, Breaches of the Peace and Acts of Aggression," which are legally binding under international law, and can be followed up with economic sanctions, military action, and similar uses of force through the auspices of the United Nations.
data.answer: 违反《宪章》的指控也可由安全理事会成员国提出。安理会随后可以根据《联合国宪章》第六章通过决议，建议“和平解决争端”。“这些决议根据国际法是没有约束力的，虽然它们通常表达了安理会的信念。在极少数情况下，安理会可以根据《联合国宪章》第七章通过有关“对和平的威胁、破坏和平和侵略行为”的决议，在国际法下具有法律约束力，并可在联合国主持下采取经济制裁、军事行动和类似的武力使用。
